thread.title: Man who lived with Liberal Democrat councillor and partner in threeway relationship set fire to their house
thread.title_full: Man who lived with Liberal Democrat councillor and partner in threeway relationship set fire to their house

author: Agency
title: Man who lived with Liberal Democrat councillor and partner in threeway relationship set fire to their house
text: Crime Man who lived with Liberal Democrat councillor and partner in threeway relationship set fire to their house Drug addict jailed for arson attack on south London home of councillor he was in sexual relationship with that was accepted by partner Councillor Hamish Pollock, right, and his civil partner Ambrosio Reyes, left By Agency
